plugin.name: resize
plugin._long: A plugin to resize windows by dragging them from any part (not just the edges).

option.name: activate
option._long: When the specified button is held down, you can drag a window to resize it.

option.name: activate_preserve_aspect
option._long: When the specified button is held down, you can drag a window to resize it while perserving its orignal aspect.

option.name: activate_key
option._long: Start an interactive resize where the arrow keys can be used along with the mouse to resize a view. Press enter to exit.

option.name: step
option._long: Change the size by this amount when using the arrow keys.
